mapper.insert: insert into reply(rep_num, num, rep_content, userid) values(boardsq.nextval,#{num},#{rep_content},#{userid})
mapper.select: select rep_num,rep_content, r.userid, rep_date, mem_prof , m.userid from reply r join member m on r.userid= m.userid where num=#{param1} order by rep_num
mapper.delete: delete from reply where rep_num=#{rep_num} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.update: update reply set rep_content=#{rep_content} where rep_num=#{rep_num} and userid=#{userid}
